title.rendered: Introducing Schmutzes, The Luxury Leather Shoe Wipe That Helps To Cleanse The Insole

content.rendered:
Your dirty little secret is out!

Get The Schmutz out!

Our wipes remove the embarrassing ‘Schmutz’ left behind inside the shoe. To clean the insoles, simply ‘Wipe. Sparkle. Walk.’

I’m so excited to introduce Schmutzes to the luxury shoe community. Our Schmutzes On-The-Go is perfect for a quick clean & our Flow Pack is the perfect closet companion for our valued clients!”

— Amy Adler, Founder & CEO of Schmutzes

MIAMI, FLORIDA, UNITED STATES, August 15, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Introducing Schmutzes, the luxury leather shoe wipe that helps to cleanse the insole.

After working with luxury shoe brands for years, Amy Adler saw a need and created a specially formulated wipe for luxury leather shoes to keep the insole clean.

Schmutzes has been created for luxury shoes and these specialized wipes remove sweat, dirt, and bacteria lurking within footwear. The name ‘Schmutzes’ came from the dirt, sweat, and bacteria lurking inside shoes, which is also known as the ‘Schmutz’ left in a shoe. With this cutting-edge shoe cleansing wipe, achieving spotless, fresh-looking insoles is the result every time. These wipes remove the embarrassing ‘Schmutz’ left behind inside the shoe. To clean the insoles, simply ‘Wipe. Sparkle. Walk.’

Schmutzes ensures that shoes remain comfortable, fresh, and free from any unwanted surprises no matter what the plans are!

Made with meticulous attention to detail, the Schmutzes Flow Pack contains 20 premium shoe cleansing wipes that are specially formulated to tackle tough stains and grime from any luxury shoe collection. Each wipe is infused with a powerful cleaning solution that effortlessly removes dirt, oil, and other stubborn marks, leaving shoes looking, smelling, and feeling fresh.

“I am so excited to introduce Schmutzes to the luxury shoe community. This is truly a labor of love…Our Schmutzes On-The-Go is perfect for a quick clean and our 20-Count Flow Pack is perfect for our valued clients,” said Amy Adler, Founder & CEO of Schmutzes. “At Schmutzes, we understand the importance of keeping shoes clean, hygienic, and well-maintained, and the team has worked to create a product that did not exist and a product that exceeds expectations. Whether preparing for a special occasion, attending an important event, or simply maintaining day-to-day footwear, these wipes offer unparalleled convenience and efficiency.

Key Features of Schmutzes

– Specially designed micro-dots to facilitate cleaning

– 20 premium shoe cleansing wipes per pack or 15 premium single-use sachets

– Specially formulated for leather insoles

– Easily removes tough stains, dirt, and grime

– Convenient and portable for on-the-go use

Schmutzes is quickly becoming a leading provider of innovative shoe care products. To explore our high-quality shoe care products or order Schmutzes, visit www.schmutzes.com.

Thomas Michael Claxton
Influx Marketing
+1 312-391-1446
tclaxton@helloinflux.com
Visit us on social media:

Instagram

Other

Get The Schmutz Out!

News Provided By

August 15, 2023, 14:00 GMT
